org.princehouse.mica.lib.abstractions

Class CTRWPeerSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.princehouse.mica.base.BaseProtocol
      • org.princehouse.mica.lib.abstractions.CTRWPeerSampler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Protocol

    public abstract class CTRWPeerSampler
extends BaseProtocol
    Peer sampling protocol based on the paper "Peer counting and sampling in overlay networks based on random walks" by Ganesh, Kermarrec, Merrer, Massoulie
    See Also:
